name: Graywise
goal:
A Brussels based consultancy providing services on governance, compliance and responsibility issues. This ranges from conceiving and drafting a self-regulatory strategy to the elaboration of a code, compliance and process management, setting up a self or co-regulatory scheme/programme, developing key messaging, preparing speeches and reports in relation to the strategic and practical impact of policies, monitoring compliance programmes, designing compliance programmes and assessing the impact of such schemes. Academic analysis of governance.
